RTâ€‚Builder DAO
We're very excited to welcome @paulpomerleau_ to our mission to build a better internet! Check out his intro article, give him a follow or catch him in Discord this Friday for our first #FutureFriday collaboration call.
Paul Pomerleau:â€‚Looking back, moving into web2 was easy compared to moving from web2 to web3. It shouldn't be & I want to help remove the friction. I'm excited to be joining @TheBuilderDAO to lead DevRel. It's time to look forward. Let's build a better internet, together.
â€‚https://bit.ly/38cclOV
